select t.id,t.stu_id,t1.real_name as studentName,t1.username as studentNumber,t.class_id,t2.name as className,t.lesson_id,t3.name as lessonName, t.direction,(select status from lesson_attend_log where stu_id = t.stu_id and lesson_id = t.lesson_id) as studentLessonStatus, t.status,t.duration,t.actual_deduction,t.type,t.create_time from teach_destroyed_lesson_record as t left join sys_user as t1 on t.stu_id = t1.id left join teach_class t2 on t.class_id = t2.id left join lesson t3 on t.lesson_id = t3.id where t.deleted = 0
and t1.real_name like concat('%',#{query.studentName},'%')
and t.type = #{query.type}
order by t.type,t.update_time desc,t.create_time desc
